title: Fragment, early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of chartreuse green uncut velvet on silk ground of same color. Intricate design of closely spaced, tiny flowering branches in varied forms alternating in direction.
